name: Infinity Tomb v1.0
description:
Game Description:

You wake up as a mysterious character in a dark tomb, not knowing why you are there and who you are. You have to reveal your past and the reason of your death. Why  did you die and how?

Repository Link:

https://bitbucket.org/btkgamedesign/hanna_borbola_unitywalkingsim/src/master/

Relase Notes:

Version 1.0
